name: Low income single filer
description: Single person earning £25,000 - below higher rate threshold

sources.description: Verified using online UK tax calculator for 2025/26
sources.notes: Personal allowance: £12,570, Taxable: £12,430, Income tax (20%): £2,486, NI (8%): £994, Total deductions: £3,480, Net: £21,520
